thread.title: Pakistan submarine fires at four Indian boats, 24 fishermen arrested | Deccan Chronicle
thread.title_full: Pakistan submarine fires at four Indian boats, 24 fishermen arrested | Deccan Chronicle

author: ANI
title: Pakistan submarine fires at four Indian boats, 24 fishermen arrested | Deccan Chronicle
text: ANI | October 15, 2015, 18.38 pm Representational Image Jakhau: Pakistan submarine on Thursday fired at four Indian boats carrying 25 fishermen on port of Jakhau village in Gujarat. One fisherman was injured in the firing and 24 others were arrested by Pakistan navy. Earlier, Pakistani navy had fired at an Indian boat off the Gujarat coast, killing one fisherman. According to the reports, Pakistan has seized 837 Indian boats and has put 257 Indian fishermen in jails.
